Description: 2026-02-14 (Sat) to 2026-02-17 (Tue, HN repost). Goal: a stranger can get a verified receipt in <=10 minutes on Mac + Linux, and every public claim is defensible.
2026-02-18 (Wed) to 2026-02-24 (Tue). Convert attention into first successful installs and first real receipts/settlements; respond fast enough that early adopters feel an alive product.
2026-02-25 (Wed) to 2026-03-07 (Sat). Only build what triage indicates reduces time-to-first-receipt or increases trust; aim for 1-3 paying accounts or explicit design partners.
2026-03-07 (Sat) to 2026-03-21 (Sat). Make it safe to keep running: reliability, security posture, and operability based on observed usage.

Summary: Sprint E: Multi-Agent Operating System (1 week)
Description: 2026-02-19 (Thu) to 2026-02-26 (Thu). Operationalize an 8-agent company model with strict ownership
